reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Peel and cut the onion crosswise into 20-millimetre slices, then separate into rings.
Set up for dredging: Place flour in a shallow dish.
Combine beaten eggs and water in a second shallow dish.
Place breadcrumbs in a third shallow dish.
Divide the garlic salt, seasoned salt and cayenne evenly across the 3 bowls and stir each to combine.
Dredge onions as follows: 1) egg mixture, 2) flour mixture, 3) egg mixture, 4) flour mixture, 5) egg mixture, 6) breadcrumbs, pressing crumbs firmly on all sides.
Optional for easier handling: Place coated onions in a shallow tray and place in the freezer for 30 minutes.
Place the cooking tray on the bottom of the air fry basket. Using the display panel, select AIR FRY, then adjust the temperature to 400°F / 205°C and the time to 10 minutes, then touch START.

When the display indicates “Add Food” place onion rings in a single layer on the cooking tray (you may need to work in batches). When the display indicates “Turn Food” turn the onion rings over. When the Air Fry program is complete, remove the onion rings and serve hot.
Cauliflower Bites: Cut the cauliflower into small bite sized pieces or your preferred size
In a bowl add your eggs and cornstarch and mix until smooth
Add garlic, ginger, onion powder, smoked paprika and salt and mix well
Take one piece of cauliflower and submerge it in batter, then coat in panko
Apply pressure with hands so panko sticks
Repeat this with all cauliflower bites
Set Air Fryer to 400°F / 205°C for 30 minutes
When Air Fryer BEEPS to 'Add Food' put food tray in and set time for 30 minutes, at 15 minutes it will tell you to turn food
Take it out and flip over
While this is cooking start Spicy Korean BBQ sauce
Spicy Korean BBQ Sauce: Using your Instant Pot choose the Sauté, Normal feature, and drizzle oil into the bottom. Alternatively, use a pan and follow the same process.
Once the pot is hot then lightly fry the garlic for 1-2 minutes
Add all remaining ingredients and gently simmer on low for 20 minutes
If it finishes before the cauliflower bites, press Keep Warm
Once cauliflower bites are done, submerge into Spicy Korean BBQ sauce and enjoy!

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Sprinkle the corn with olive oil, salt, black pepper and smoked paprika.
Air Fry for approximately 10 minutes, 400°F / 205°C.
While the corn is roasting, make the dip. Add mayonnaise, sriracha sauce and lemon juice to a clean small bowl.
Remove corn from the air fryer and transfer to the serving plate. Garnish with the feta cheese, fresh coriander and lime wedges, and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Corn on the Cob
recipe.description: Delicious corn of the cob. Excellent summer side dish for any meal.

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Add the cod fillet to a clean work surface and pat dry with paper towels. Sprinkle with taco seasoning and salt and pepper.
To a clean plate, add plain flour. Then, to a separate bowl, add the egg. In a third bowl, add the panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, dill and lemon zest.

Using one hand, coat one of the pieces of cod with flour and then put it directly into the egg mixture. Make sure the fish is coated in the egg, but not dripping. Then place the fish in the panko and using your other hand, thoroughly coat all sides of the fish. Repeat with all pieces and spray with cooking oil.

Attach the air fryer basket to the air fryer basket base and insert them both into the inner pot. Place the fish in the air fryer basket, leaving space between them on the tray, spray all sides with cooking spray oil. Close the air fryer lid on the instant pot cooker base.
Select the air fry button and set it to 400°F / 205°C for 12 minutes. Once the lid beeps to indicate the turn food sign, use tongs to turn the fish.
Optional Yogurt Dip: Add greek yogurt, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, dill, sea salt and black pepper to a clean small bowl. Serve dip with fish on serving plate.

recipe.name: Crispy Panko Fish Fry
recipe.description: Panko fish. Add French Fries for Fish and Chips dish.

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid
Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Gently place the room temperature eggs in the frying chamber of the Air Fryer.

Select the Air Fry function, then set the temperature to 270°F / 132°C and the time for 9 minutes. Start the Air Fryer with the eggs in the frying chamber whilst preheating. Ignore when prompted to “Add Food” and “Turn Food.”

Once cooked, use tongs to remove the eggs from the frying chamber and place immediately into a bowl of cold water for 5 minutes. Dry the eggs with a paper towel then roll on a hard surface to break the shell and carefully peel this away. Serve how you fancy!

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Peel the potatoes & chop into chip or fry shapes. Massage olive oil, pepper & chilli flakes on to the chopped potatoes. Add to Air Fryer.
Select AIR FRY and set the time for 18 minutes, at 400°F / 204°C and turn food halfway through.
Once cooked, plate up with a squeeze of lime & garnish with more chilli flakes.

Peel the potatoes and cut into 4-6 chunks, depending on the size of the potato. Place the potatoes in a large pot of salted water, then place the lid on the pot and bring to the boil. Cook the potatoes until just soft. Then drain and lightly chuff in the colander to roughen the edges.
Tip the potatoes into a roasting tray. Using a sieve, dust the potatoes in flour, and then scatter over the polenta.
Finally drizzle over rapeseed oil, and toss the potatoes until well coated in oil, and polenta. Season the potatoes with salt and pepper.
Select Air Fry on the appliance and set the temperature to 195°C / 385°F and the time to 35 minutes.
When prompted to Add Food, place the roasties inside, and give the basket a shake when prompted to Turn Food.

Once the timer hits 30 minutes, check your potatoes. They should be crispy and golden. If you are happy with the colour, sprinkle over your parmesan (or nutritional yeast), then place the drawer back in to continue cooking. Once ready to serve plate up your potatoes topped with freshly chopped parsley.

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid
Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

carousels.subtitle: The staples for your air fryer
carousels.title: Air Fryer Basics

steps.text: Put the cooked rice into a bowl and season with garlic, seasoning and mixed herbs, then mix in the parmesan and grated mozzarella.
With damp hands, create a mini patty of rice and place 1-2 tsp of MINCED beef on top then mold the rice into a ball, ensuring the beef stays in the middle.
Set up for dredging and put the flour, eggs and breadcrumbs into three separate bowls.
Cover each rice ball in flour, then egg and then the breadcrumbs until all our coated.
Place the breaded balls in the fridge for around 30 minutes.
Preheat the air fryer until display indicates Add Food.
Then spray the cooking chamber with oil and add the balls.
Select Air Fry and adjust the temperature to 205°C / 400°F and set the time to 14 minutes.
Serve on top of a bed of arrabbiata sauce, and extra parmesan.

carousels.subtitle: Popular for air fryers
carousels.title: Meats air fried to crisp perfection

steps.text: Add small amount of sugar to the milk and whisk in the yeast, then set aside for 5 minutes so a froth forms.
Add the remaining dough ingredients into a large bowl, give the yeast mixture another quick whisk and add to the dry ingredients. Then mix into a soft dough.
Once mixed, knead the dough on a lightly floured surface for 5 minutes. Put in a warm place, covered whilst it proves.

Once the dough has doubled in size, remove it from the bowl onto a lightly floured surface and knead it lightly for another minute before rolling into an oblong shape. The dough will be quite springy but can be gently pulled into shape between rolling.
Mix the filling ingredients together, and then spread evenly over the dough.
Starting with one of the longer sides carefully roll the dough keeping it as tight as possible wrapping the filling inside then cut the dough into 12 equal portions.
Line the air fryer basket with baking paper and arrange the swirls directly onto the paper leaving a small gap between each.
With the air fryer turned off, put the basket back in and leave to prove for 25 minutes
Once the dough has doubled again, turn the air fryer on and select Bake, setting the temperature to 170°C / 340°F and the time for 13 minutes, and press Start.
When the cooking program finishes, remove the basket and carefully lift the swirls out, keeping them on the baking paper.
In a bowl, mix the icing ingredients together until smooth, then glaze the swirls whilst they're still hot. Enjoy!

items.title: Crispy Butternut and Date Vegan Swirl

steps.text: Place your butternut chunks and chickpeas into the appliance basket. Drizzle over a little oil, and salt, then close the air frying drawer.
Select Air Fry, set the temperature to 190°C /375°F, and the time to 15 minutes and press Start.
While the butternut squash & chickpeas cooks, caramelise your onions but sautéing them on a medium low heat, stirring occasionally until golden brown and sticky.

When the butternut squash and chickpeas are cooked, and the onions caramelized, combine them in a bowl with the almonds, mint, parsley, dates and garlic. Mix everything together until well combined, then season to taste with salt and pepper.
On a clean work surface, place a piece of filo pastry with the long edge facing away from you. Brush the filo lightly with melted butter.

Place another sheet of filo down overlapping the first by about 5cm (2 inch) to create a longer wide rectangle. Layer the remaining sheets of filo, on top of the first two, brushing melted vegan butter between the layers as you go.

Spoon the butternut filling along the long edge of the rectangle, forming a long sausage shape about 4cm (1.5 inch) thick. Squish the filling together with your hands to make it compact, and remove any large air pockets.
Roll the filo around the filling into a large long snake shape, then work quickly to roll the snake of pastry into a snail shape, then brush it with vegan butter.
Place the spiral pastry into a pie dish that can fit into your air fryer. (It is possible to cook the spiral without the pie dish, however the dish helps maintain the spiral shape.)
Select Air Fry on the air fryer and set the temperature to 170°C / 340°F and time to 25 minutes and press Start.
Add the pie dish to the air fryer basket when prompted and ignore when prompted to turn food.
Cook the swirl until the pastry is a deep golden brown. (The spiral can be made in advance, and cooked, and reheated in the vortex on the reheat function until warmed through.)

While the spiral cooks, make your salad and tzatziki. Cut a 5cm (2 inch) chunk off your cucumber, reserving the larger half for the salad. Grate the 5cm (2 inch) cucumber piece and drain any excess water.
Mix the grated cucumber with the coconut yogurt and finely chopped mint.
Halve the lime, squeezing a little lime juice into the tzatziki (about ½ tsp) and reserving the rest for the salad. Taste the tzatziki adding salt as needed. Set aside.
Thinly slice the red onion and add it to a bowl with a sprinkle of salt and squeeze the remaining lime juice. Toss everything together then set the onions aside to soften and pickle.
Once the Crispy Butternut and Date Vegan Swirl is cooked dice your remaining cucumber into chunks and toss it with the pickled red onion and lime juice, and remaining mint leaves.
Season the salad with salt and pepper, then serve with the vegan swirl.

recipe.name: Crispy Butternut and Date Vegan Swirl

carousels.subtitle: Dishes designed to make the holidays simple
carousels.title: In Season

Then place the fish in the panko and using your other hand, thoroughly coat all sides of the fish. Repeat with all pieces and spray with cooking oil.

Attach the air fryer basket to the air fryer basket base and insert them both into the inner pot. Place the fish in the air fryer basket, leaving space between them on the tray, spray all sides with cooking spray oil. Close the air fryer lid on the instant pot cooker base.

recipe.name: Crispy Panko Fish Fry
recipe.description: Panko fish. Add French Fries for Fish and Chips dish.

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Season both sides of the chicken with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Set up 3 shallow dishes, one with the flour, seasoned with a pinch of salt and pepper, one with the lightly beaten egg, mixed with  water, and one with the breadcrumbs.
Dip the chicken in the flour, then the egg and then the breadcrumbs covering the chicken breast to form an even coating.
Place the prepared chicken in the air fryer basket onto a lightly oiled rack.
Select Air Fry and set the temperature to 188°C / 370°F and the time to 12 minutes. Ignore when prompted to Add Food as it will already be inside and flip the chicken over when prompted to Turn Food.
While the chicken cooks make the slaw by combining the shredded cabbage with salt, pepper, mayonnaise, chilli flakes and garlic in a bowl.
To plate up, smear some mayonnaise on the base of your roll, then top with your chicken and slaw and serve immediately.

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Mix plain flour, sugar, cocoa, milk, olive oil and vanilla extract in a bowl until the mixture is thick and creamy. Add a dash more milk if the consistency is too thick and sticky.
Place 1 tablespoon of the milk chocolate into each mug, then add the cake mixture on top, splitting evenly amongst the mugs. Top each mug with the remaining milk chocolate.
Select ‘Air Fry’, set the time to 5 minutes and the temperature to 166°C / 330°F. Press ‘Start’.
When prompted to ‘Add Food’, place the 4 mugs inside the air fryer – ignore when the display indicates to ‘Turn’.

When the cooking program finishes, carefully remove the mugs and leave to cool slightly before topping with whipped cream, any remaining chocolate and a dusting of cocoa powder straight into each mug. Enjoy immediately for delicious gooey chocolateness!

reference_tags.name: Instant Pot + Air Fryer Combo with Ultimate Lid

steps.text: Pat the cod fillets dry and set up for dredging with flour in one bowl and panko breadcrumbs in another.
In a third bowl, mix the mayonnaise with water, paprika part of garlic and lemon juice and mix.
Dip the fillets into the flour, then the mayonnaise “batter”, then finally dip them into the panko crumbs.

Select Air Fry and set the temperature to 200°C / 405°F and time to 12 minutes, cook until the fish flakes easily when pressed and the crumbs are golden brown. Do not turn the fillets as they can break apart.
While the fish cooks: Chop the mint finely and place the peas in a bowl, cover with boiling water and drain after 5 minutes.
Add the lemon zest to the peas and grate the remaining garlic into the peas then add the remaining lemon juice and set aside for 3 minutes.
When your fish is nearly ready, mash the peas with the zest and garlic.
Season to taste and add in the chopped mint.
Remove the fish from the air fryer and serve with your minty lemony peas.

recipe.name: Crispy Fish and Peas
recipe.description:
A delicious and healthy spin on a classic weeknight dinner recipe, this is one of the most flavourful ways to make beautiful, crispy and golden-brown fish, and is a firm favourite in our kitchen. Simple crispy fish and minty peas made even simpler in the air fryer in under 30 minutes. What a win!  

Dipping the fish fillets into a flavoured mayonnaise “batter” has a threefold effect on the cooking of the fish in the air fryer. As an emulsion of egg and oil, the mayonnaise dip browns the breadcrumbs better than the traditional egg dip. It is also stickier and contributes to an even, flavourful coating, while also helping the breadcrumbs to brown and crisp up.  

This recipe comes together effortlessly and relies on simple supermarket ingredients. What are you waiting for?

carousels.subtitle: Simple recipes for easy guided cooking
carousels.title: Quick & Easy
